1.19.2.2.2.1.2:
- Fix FPS not being pulled correctly
- Fix instrument and options screens being off-center
1.19.2.3.0:
Backported mod version v3.0 to Minecraft version 1.19.2!
Changes up until v3.0:

v3.0
- New pitch-accurate accidentals system! Support for flats, sharps, and their doubly variants
- Added Note Label type
- Implemented pitch names in slider
- Fixed ABC label type
- Partial Arabic language support

v2.8.2
- Improved drum sounds

v2.8.1
- Fixed drum and zither shared playing issues

v2.8
- Added the staff instrument background

v2.7.7
- All instrument sounds now play locally on a range of 5 blocks

v2.7.6
Bugfixes and API improvements

v2.7.1
- Fixed play ring's alpha channel rendering incorrectly

v2.6
- Added the visual play ring from Genshin

v2.5.1
- Fixed pitch slider being offset and not navigation-friendly

v2.5
- Implemented GUI keyboard navigation

v2.4.1
- Fixed instrument screen being present after item removal

v2.4
- Minor technical fixes

v2.3
- Texture fixes
1.19.2.3.0.1: - Fixed notes playing twice on key press

1.19.3.1.0.1:
- Fixed resources folder and package names being incorrect
- implemented Forge's updates mechanism
1.19.3.2.0:
- New instrument: Arataki's Great and Glorious Drum!
- Russian language support
1.19.3.2.3:
- More texture fixes
- Better API implementation
1.19.3.2.4.1:
- Fixed instrument screen being present after item removal
- API tweaks & fixes
